thread.title: Shawn Michaels: WWE asked me to face AJ Styles at WrestleMania 33
thread.title_full: Shawn Michaels: WWE asked me to face AJ Styles at WrestleMania 33

title: Shawn Michaels: WWE asked me to face AJ Styles at WrestleMania 33
text:
Mar 23, 2017 at 10:28p ET 0Shares 
One dream WrestleMania match that nearly any WWE would love to see is Shawn Michaels vs. AJ Styles — and it could have happened, according to the Heartbreak Kid. 
Michaels revealed that WWE offered him the opportunity to face Styles at WrestleMania 33 in Orlando, during an interview on the Sam Roberts Wrestling Podcast . “I guess I’m breaking something with you and I don’t even know if I should, but I could have had that match. They didn’t have an opponent for AJ at WrestleMania. I said that I hadn’t been asked because I hadn’t — but then I was. … I said, ‘I wish that young man was here 10 years ago, man. I honestly do. I think he’s very talented.'” 
Rumors of a Michaels-Styles match surfaced prior to the Royal Rumble in January at the Alamodome in San Antonio. Many expected the Heartbreak Kid to return to the ring in his hometown for the 20th anniversary of him winning the WWF title at the Rumble, which happened in the same building. 
Styles fueled those rumors when he tweeted a mock Royal Rumble promo poster that a fan made. Interesting photo….. is it not? pic.twitter.com/MKgF4XoAF1 
Michaels hasn’t competed since 2010, when he faced The Undertaker in WrestleMania 26 and retired after losing the match. 
The Phenomenal One is scheduled to face Shane McMahon next weekend at WrestleMania 33 in Orlando.
